CustomField.description: If checked, an object will be created for each duplicate matching Id. For example, if checked and two accounts have the same query field value, then each account will have a duplicate record created. If this is left unchecked, no records will be created for any duplicate matches.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, an object will be created for each duplicate matching Id. For example, if checked and two accounts have the same query field value, then each account will have a duplicate record created. If this is left unchecked, no records will be created f
CustomField.label: Allow Multiple Matches?
